title: Expression for arc length of curve

content.question:
The length of the curve y=ln sec x from x=0 to x=b, where <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="0 less than b less than pi divided by 2">
 <semantics>
 <mrow>
 <mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><mi>b</mi><mo><</mo><mfrac>
 <mi>π</mi>
 <mn>2</mn>
 </mfrac>
 </mrow>
 <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=
 feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn

 a8aabaWdbiaaikdaaaaaaa@3C86@
 </annotation>
 </semantics>
</math>
, may be expressed by which of the following integrals?
